title: Data & Studies - SEO Blog by Ahrefs
description: Studies and data-driven insights are crucial for understanding the ever-changing search landscape. Check out the resources below to improve your SEO knowledge with unique data and insights.

How Ahrefs Counts Links and Domains Every backlink tool stores different links. Learn what we do and don't store. How long does it take to rank in Google? Here's How to Be in the Other 3.45% [New Research for 2023] Learn why your pages might not be getting traffic from Google.
